content: i have been approached by the pattern maker of a dress purse pattern asking me not to publish my pattern of the dress bag after much consideration i have decided to share my free pattern being that it is quite different to her pattern i have never read or purchased her pattern to know how her pattern was made and sort of based on the dress pot holder that gets around for free in several different versions i wrote my pattern from beginning to end and only with some visual aid from the picture of a dress pot holder i am not out to make money from this i just enjoy sharing my skills with others
